author: @WHSVnews
title: Winter Storm Warning issued January 2 at 9:57PM EST until January 4 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
text:
Updated: 3 hours ago
HARRISONBURG, Va. (WHSV) - Norovirus, a highly contagious virus sometimes called the stomach flu, has been spreading across the country and the Commonwealth.
Updated: 3 hours ago
AUGUSTA COUNTY, Va. (WHSV) - Caleb McCauley pleaded guilty in Augusta County Circuit Court to one count of malicious wounding after video evidence revealed him assaulting an elderly inmate at Middle River Regional Jail.
Updated: 4 hours ago
MOUNT CRAWFORD, Va. (WHSV) - As part of its ongoing construction, the super convenience store chain Buc-eeâ€™s has traffic management built into its development plans ahead of its Independence Day grand opening.
Updated: 5 hours ago
WARREN COUNTY, Va. (WHSV) - A former employee at Rappahannock Shenandoah Warren Regional Jail has been charged with allegedly smuggling drugs to prisoners in the facility.
Updated: 12 hours ago
We highlight some of the positive stories of 2024.
